enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.PropertyCategory
enumtype.description: Determines if the property's value can and should be personally set by the user or be a common setting for all environments which can be centrally controlled.

enum.name: common
enum.description: A common property is defined in the environment definition. Its value is not supposed to be changed not be changed personally. Whenever its is changed in the environment definition file all installed environments can overtake this change during the next run of the renv "update" or "configure" command.

enum.name: personal
enum.description: A personal property can be adapted by a developer.
